titles.title: A resolution recognizing that John Sidney McCain, III, is a natural born citizen.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Leahy without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 715.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of measure as passed Senate

bill.summary: 4/30/2008--Passed Senate without amendment. States that John Sidney McCain, III, is a "natural born Citizen'' under Article II, Section 1, of the Constitution of the United States.
